text: Alvard Petrossyan (, October 4, 1946 - March 10, 2022) was an Armenian writer, philologist, publicist and politician. She was born in Yerevan, Armenia. She was a deputy in the National Assembly for the Armenian Revolutionary Federation from 1999 until 2012. Petrossyan died on March 10, 2022 in Yerevan at the age of 75.Cкончалась Алвард Петросян ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Armenian writers Category:Armenian politicians Category:People from Yerevan Category:20th-century Armenian people
title: Alvard Petrossyan
